column4: anybody help me?i install nvidia drivers and now when i start me pc i see 2 choices.....a 386 kernel and a generic?which i must prefer?
anybody help me?i install nvidia drivers and now when i start me pc i see 2 choices.....a 386 kernel and a generic?which i must prefer?
There is this issue when you install the nvidia drivers. I have found a solution for it but you can apply it before installing nvidia drivers
before installing nvdia-glx it is wise to do apt-get isntall linux-generic. this way the 386 kernel won't be install along with the nvidia-glx package
kane ena reinstall kai meta PRIN valeis tous drivers, dose se terminal: sudo apt-get install linux-generic
etsi meta dn tha perastei o 286 :)
It is not an IRC channel. You register at e-pcmag.gr and then you come into the chat ;)
